name: Wave_Prototype-3h
description:
At first made for the Trijam #212, I totally blew the timer ("^w^)... So there is no sound and no art. Buuut at least it works, so I choose to put it there anyways.

So here is a hero defending against wave of enemy... until they lose (for now). You have two type of actions for now : Attack and Heal. The next action plays automatically but you can pay 5 and activate one of the card immediately by paying 5hp.

I'll probably come back to add some stuff (like working on it 3h every week), starting with a hero sprite and some polishing on effect lisibility.

Next objective is to make some enemy sprite, a Boss sprite, and some stat generation for monsters.
